body:
Comment 2 by **hughrobinson@google.com**: 
The phrase "struct literal" for the syntax is fine.  I'm complaining about the phrase
"pointer to a struct literal" because "literal" should refer to the syntax, whereas it's
being used here to refer to the object that was constructed by the syntax.

My suggestion is to change the one sentence "The special prefix & â€¦" so that it reads
"The special prefix & constructs a pointer to the newly allocated struct."  The rest of
the tour is fine.
